work.title: Bonsai
work.description:
I started working on contract to help implement the front-end for Bonsai in June 2016.
The company aimed to embrace future-facing technologies, and I help implement features using a combination of Ruby on Rails, jQuery, and React-Redux.
It's been the ultimate pleasure to help build tools that I love to use myself.
work.description_excerpt: Building on React-Redux on Rails for the freelance management platform.

work.title: BloomNation
work.description:
I joined BloomNation in 2015 as a front-end developer to an engineering team of four. My role revolved around all user-facing BloomNation products, including their marketplace, blog, resource center for florists, email marketing, and florist tools.
Being apart of a company that helped many business owners survive in challenging times was a huge learning experience.
work.description_excerpt: Building with PHP, advanced CSS, and JavaScript for the florist web platform.
